The department may exempt a proposed major CO facility from the requirements of
this Subpart if the facility emission potential for carbon monoxide is less
than 100 tons per year, provided the source owner demonstrates to the
satisfaction of the department that carbon monoxide emissions from the facility
will not cause the significant air quality impact criteria in section 231-2.14
of this Subpart for carbon monoxide to be exceeded. Notes
